data.title: Bill Johnson & Associates Real Estate
data.meta_description: Farm and ranch, residential, commercial, and investment sales in Austin, Washington, Colorado, Waller, Lee, Grimes, and Fayette Counties in Texas.
data.text:
Status: Available

Price: $2,900,000.00

Property Description: The perfect retreat nestled in the heart of Austin County on +/- 97 acres of gorgeous countryside. A well designed 4 BDRM/3.5 Bath barndominium offers 2,520 sqft of living space along with plenty of storage. The open concept living/dining/kitchen space makes it the perfect place for entertaining guests. A covered deck overlooks the pool, outdoor entertaining area and additional 517 sqft flex space. This can serve as a gym, office, or additional room for guests. The ranch offers sprawling trees, cross fencing, a live creek, pond, and 940 ft of road frontage off Sycamore Crossing. Other improvements include barns, pens, and a 517 sqft structure. This private escape is the perfect place to meet all of your residential and recreational needs.

BILL JOHNSON AND ASSOCIATES REAL ESTATE COMPANY WILL CO-BROKER IF BUYER IS ACCOMPANIED BY HIS/HER AGENT AT ALL PROPERTY SHOWINGS.

Status: Available

Price: $1,395,000.00

Property Description: Take a drive down Star Hill Road and one will notice the large ranches situated on the rolling terrain of the West End of Austin County. The paved road is one of the most popular in the area, with high elevation, and beautiful properties. 2054 Star Hill Road is no different - with 43+ lush acres, a pond, creek, mature trees, distant views, ag-exempt and unrestricted – this property is unmatched. The original 1917 farmhouse was updated from top to bottom in 2009 – while leaving the original wood flooring, walls, and ceilings. The 2/2 farmhouse is perfect for your stay, with more building sites on the tract if you choose. Words are not enough to describe this property, you must see it for yourself, to truly appreciate.

BILL JOHNSON AND ASSOCIATES REAL ESTATE COMPANY WILL CO-BROKER IF BUYER IS ACCOMPANIED BY HIS/HER AGENT AT ALL PROPERTY SHOWINGS.

Status: Available

Price: $2,250,000.00

Property Description: Creekside Ranch. INCOME PRODUCING! MINIMAL FLOOD PLAIN @ CREEK. Per seller, NO STRUCTURES HAVE EVER FLOODED. Soil reports STATE THIS LAND IS SANDY LOAM. West of Katy, 1hr from Houston. Join the best POLO players in the league, horses & ranchers alike! Peace & tranquility on 81+acres. IMPROVED ROAD, PROPER DRAINAGE, TREES, FENCED PASTURES, RIDING ARENA. PRIVATE HOME (circa 1902), BARNS, POOL, POOL HOUSE w/2 ADDITIONAL RENTALS in barns, covered porches. Take your party to the pool house so guests can enjoy the indoors mixed w/the outdoors. It’s the perfect combo for entertaining. WANT EXTRA INCOME? Phones are ringing! 3 LIVING AREAS FOR RENT. 24 HORSE STALLS, STORAGE, TACK ROOMS, 2 TURN AROUNDS for easy hauling, ROUND PEN. Comfortably board horses & bring help. FULLY FENCED & CROSS FENCED. POND + CREEK + WOODS = WILDLIFE. Trail ride & enjoy the ever-changing skies; watch the sunset over Texas while night stars glisten against the dark sky.

BILL JOHNSON AND ASSOCIATES REAL ESTATE COMPANY WILL CO-BROKER IF BUYER IS ACCOMPANIED BY HIS/HER AGENT AT ALL PROPERTY SHOWINGS.

Status: AVAILABLE

Price: $965,000.00

Property Description: GORGEOUS home situated on approx. 4.2 acres in the sought after Sycamore Hills Subdivision. The property offers a perfect blend of spaciousness and serenity. Large windows throughout the home flood the space with natural light, creating an inviting and uplifting atmosphere. Boasting 2,865 sq ft of living space, the residence features 4 bedrooms and 3 baths, a large kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a gas cooktop. The stunning limestone fireplace and vaulted ceilings serve as the focal point of the open living area, adding warmth and character. Wood floors flow seamlessly throughout the home. The spacious primary suite is an oasis of relaxation featuring double vanities, soaking tub with separate shower. His and her walk-in closets offer plenty of space and storage. Entertain effortlessly in the fully equipped back porch summer kitchen and firepit area, perfect for al fresco dining. The 20x30 barn with concrete floor offers versatility for hobbies or storage. Surrounding the property are majestic oak trees, lending shade and beauty to the landscape. This home presents a rare opportunity to enjoy both tranquility and convenience.

BILL JOHNSON AND ASSOCIATES REAL ESTATE COMPANY WILL CO-BROKER IF BUYER IS ACCOMPANIED BY HIS OR HER AGENT AT ALL PROPERTY SHOWINGS.
